trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were 2 other sightings in New York on or around August 3rd 2013
Summary: These were 2 Dots of hovering light blue and green each. They were revolving around the clouds as if in a chasing game.
divs: Sighting DetailsThis was the night of August 3 and I was in my room sleeping and my parents in another. It was quiet until I couldn't sleep anymore and I looked at the clouds, there I saw these lights that were hovering and playing "chase" with each other and I thought I was hallucinating so with doubt I called on my parents. They saw what I did and we tried to capture it on the lphone camera but the background was too dark, since the light fuse of my room was out. It was sensational to be sharing my experience to others. So. Bi. 21. Queens,NY
